name: InstallShield Express 2 Project File
summary: An IWZ file is a project created by Flexera InstallShield Express 2.x, a tool that helps developers create installation packages for Windows applications. It contains key components of an installation project, such as configuration settings, file paths, InstallScript code, and user interface ( UI ) elements like dialog text and images.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
